kubejs.ponder.tag.natures_aura.descripti: 利用周围的光环达到最佳效果
kubejs.ponder.birth_spirit.text_1: 在灵气水平高的区域繁殖动物有几率掉落出生育之魂。
kubejs.ponder.brilliant_fiber.text_1: 叶子将开始转化为金色的叶子
kubejs.ponder.crimson_altar.text_1: 如果自然祭坛建在下界，它会变成猩红祭坛。
kubejs.ponder.heph_forge.text_6: 此区域必须明确以进行转换
kubejs.ponder.heph_forge2.text_1: 暗黑石基座可以这样放置，它们可以用于展示物品
kubejs.ponder.heph_forge2.text_2: 将神秘水晶方尖碑置于火神熔炉结构中会为熔炉充入能量
kubejs.ponder.holy_sap.header: 从富脂符文原木中提取神圣树脂浆
kubejs.ponder.holy_sap.text_1: 您会在符文树上找到一些富脂符文原木。
kubejs.ponder.malum_soul_totem.text_1: The Undirected Rite contains great power, until activated
kubejs.ponder.malum_soul_totem.text_2: Right Click the Totem Base to activate the Rite
kubejs.ponder.malum_soul_totem.text_3: This Rite will convert the Totem into Soulwood, which can have strange effects on basic Rites
kubejs.ponder.malum_soul_totem.text_4: After activating the Rite again, now on the newly formed Soulwood Totem, it will start converting items in a 9x9 area around it
kubejs.ponder.malum_soul_totem.text_5: Placed items work, as well as dropped items, or items on display stands. The conversions only work on top of Blighted Soil
kubejs.ponder.malum_totem.text_1: Place up to 5 Runewood Logs on top of the Totem Base
kubejs.ponder.malum_totem.text_2: Apply Spirits to carve patterns based on the desired effect, as show in the Encyclopedia Arcana
kubejs.ponder.malum_totem.text_3: You can clear the Totem carvings by right clicking with an axe
kubejs.ponder.malum_totem.text_4: Right Click the Totem Base to activate the Rite
kubejs.ponder.offering_table.text_1: 放下供桌，周围摆放任何类型的鲜花。
kubejs.ponder.offering_table.text_2: 将成分放入祭坛内，在供桌周围8格丢出召唤之魂以完成工艺。
kubejs.ponder.ritual_of_the_forest.text_: 像这样放置木墩，用于搭建森林仪式
将金叶粉放在每个仪式的中心周围。
将所需的树苗放在中心。
kubejs.ponder.soul_extractor.text_1: 长按右键灵魂沙提取出灵魂，同时灵魂沙会变成失魂沙
kubejs.ponder.spirit_altar.text_1: The Spirit Altar requires Spirits and items for crafting
kubejs.ponder.spirit_altar.text_2: Item Pedestals are placed within 4 blocks from the central Altar
kubejs.ponder.spirit_altar.text_3: Item Stands can also be used
kubejs.ponder.spirit_altar.text_4: Up to 4 Runewood Obelisks can also be used to increase speed
kubejs.ponder.spirit_crucible.header: Using the Spirit Crucible for Focusing
kubejs.ponder.spirit_crucible.text_1: Spirit Focusing just requires the Crucible
kubejs.ponder.spirit_crucible.text_2: Up to 8 Spirit Catalyzers can be placed within 3 blocks of the Crucible
kubejs.ponder.spirit_crucible.text_3: Place furnace fuel items on the Catalyzers before starting the recipe
kubejs.ponder.spirit_crucible.text_4: Each fuled Catalyzer increases the speed of the recipe, along with the durability loss of the central item
kubejs.ponder.spirit_repair.header: Using the Spirit Crucible to repair items
kubejs.ponder.spirit_repair.text_1: Spirit Repairing also requires a Twisted Tablet, which will hold the raw material
kubejs.ponder.spirit_repair.text_2: The item to repair must be placed last
